review: I love this fire stick. It was temporarily out of stock when I place my order. It arrived earlier than expected. The setup was easy with that animated intro plus it was already connected to my account to watch my prime TV/movies. I own a Roku and Comcast but the Fire stick has lots of games for my grandkids. Its a knockout in my home!
author: Deboss

review: Love it. 100 times better than my chromecast. Bought it at the same time as Amazon prime subscription witch was also worth the $$$
author: anthony boremi

review: Used to watch MLBTV.  Only had issues.  Cancelled MLBTV and returned fire TV stick.  All I had was a week of aggravation, but at least I got my money back.
author: John D.

review: Honestly, I love amazon. Buy way more than I should on here. But this thing is a piece of $h1t.... I have great Internet service and all of my other electronics have no problem but whenever I try to use Hulu, WWE, or MLB this thing lags, loses service or freezes! It's my fault for buying a cheap piece of crap  I guess. Lesson learned, buy items on Amazon, not by Amazon....
author: Robert Haney

review: Most of the apps don't work...freezes constantly...needs to offer more popular apps...please fix
author: ms marlene the cake queen

review: It took me awhile to figure out how to work it but I love it! Have to force myself to turn it off at night and get to bed. With the same movies and shows on TV all the time, it was a great addition to my TV watching. I find it to be worth the money right now.
author: Smiling

review: I love this Firestick!  I have access to so much on my non-smart tv!!  No problems!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent product. It only took minutes to set up
author: Patricia Winters-Baker

review: It does it's job and my son loves watching cartoons on prime videos. Plus it's cheaper in price then other streaming sticks and does the same job.
author: Stanley Flores
